name: Datawheel LLC
goal: Datawheel specializes in the creation of end-to-end digital transformation solutions for governments and the private sector. We integrate multiple streams of data and build custom visualizations and analytics that empower strategic decisions.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Datawheel follows the progress of EU Big data and digital platforms, Digital skills, Cities and regions, and ICT standardization.
